item.title: Blood Orange’s Dev Hynes Creates a Chill Masterpiece With ‘Essex Honey’: Album Review
item.description: It’s been a minute for Blood Orange. The group — which is basically British-born, Brooklyn-based singer-songwriter-producer-multi-instrumentalist Dev Hynes and whoever he’s brought along for the ride
